Posts.Content: well the wait seems to be over pam starting chemo on monday although still not sure whether having it in conjuction with radio on cycle 2 until results of kidney test in which she had today. mail thing we are starting soon fingers crossed  bought her a load of scarfs etc as quote no way having wig foolishly promised to have a number 1 on my own hair instead of three will keep informed if i may nigel pam
